{"id":645096854,"lang":"cpp","time":"4Â months","timestamp":1645338782,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"62 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/645096854/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"28.4 MB","code":"struct node{\n    int x;\n    int y;\n};\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> dir = {{-1,0},{0,-1},{1,0},{0,1}};\n    int bfs(vector<vector<int>>& g,vector<vector<bool>>& vis,int x,int y){\n        queue<node> q;\n        q.push(node{x,y});\n        int cnt = 0;\n        while(!q.empty()){\n            auto t = q.front();\n            q.pop();\n            if(t.x<0 || t.y<0 || t.x>=g.size() || t.y>=g[0].size()){\n                continue;\n            }\n            if(vis[t.x][t.y] == true){\n                continue;\n            }\n            vis[t.x][t.y] = true;\n            if(g[t.x][t.y]==1){\n                cnt++;\n                for(int i=0;i<dir.size();i++){\n                q.push(node{t.x + dir[i][0] , t.y + dir[i][1]});\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return cnt;\n    }\n    int maxAreaOfIsland(vector<vector<int>>& g) {\n        vector<vector<bool>> vis(g.size(),vector<bool>(g[0].size(),false));\n        int m = g.size(),n = g[0].size();\n        int ans = 0;\n        for(int i=0;i<m;i++){\n            for(int j=0;j<n;j++){\n                if(g[i][j]==1 && vis[i][j]==false){\n                    ans = max(ans,bfs(g,vis,i,j));\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island"}
